name: VoiceRecall
0:
”Alexa open voice recall”
”Alexa open voice recall and where is my laptop”
”Alexa open voice recall and what is in box 1”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: voice recall
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Have you ever packed up all of your stuff and moved?
Or maybe you just put items in boxes and move them to storage.
And then you forgot which items where in which boxes.
This application solves that problem.
Our slogan is, “you box it, and we will find it”.

Examples:
you: "Alexa, open voice recall and tell me where I put my camera."
Alexa: Your camera is in box number 21.
Alexa: Would you like me to email it to you?

you: "Alexa, open voice recall and what is in box 20?"
Alexa: Box #1, Would you like me to email it to you?
you: "show me item 2."
Alexa: Would you like me to email you the contents of the box?


you: "Alexa, open voice recall and tell me where Jim's stuff is."
Alexa: Your Jim's stuff is in box 10, 11, 12 and 13.
you: "show me item 2."
Alexa: Would you like me to email the list?


To get the contents of a box, say:
what is in box 1
tell me what is in box 1
show me box 1


To find an item inside of a box, say:
where did i put my ...
where is ...

if you get a list of boxes, you can say 
show item 1
show line 1

Check out our demos
https://www.voicerecall.com/demo
